title: Does the Jio phone have an OTG connection? - Quora

response.answer_text: No…No….and No. This phone doesn’t support USB tethering. There is no way it can support an OTG connection. I have a jio phone and without even trying i can say that it cannot. If you dont believe me i can try it and upload some pictures as a prove.

If you are talking about the 1500 rupees Jio phone, it doesn't support OTG at all. It is a small machine after all! If you're talking about any other model of the company LYF and you're referring to that as Jio phone please mention it. Hope this helps. ☺️
